main event: Three oval objects were observed in the sky over Poulsbo, Washington on June 28, 1955.
interesting points: The objects changed colors from reddish pink to blue and back again.,The objects were about the size of a basketball.,They were seen at an altitude of 900 feet.,The objects exhibited a jerky, bouncing motion.,An investigation is planned to identify the objects through Balloon Flights scheduled for the same date.
